info.name: Tooot.im personal touch
info.description: A Mastodon server for Israeli/Hebrew tooters. "Toot" is Hebrew for strawberry so I had the button colored accordingly.
info.additionalInfo:
My personal look for tooot.im, Based on https://userstyles.org/styles/140852/mastodon-flat-dark-and-colourful

Update 2017-04-30: switched from % to 'vw' because the theme broke. enjoy!
Update 2017-11-21: add color to private messages.
